original_title: The New Mexico Mutant Baby Massacre
overview: In 1954, a nuclear test is conducted upon an ancient Native American burial ground in the state of New Mexico. Thirty years later, the land is sold to a famous fast-food chain, and the radiation from the test seeps into the food they sell, with lethal consequences for Mr and Mrs Strongburger, a holidaying couple from Minnesota.

production_companies.name: Big Dollar US Film Enterprises Ltd

title: The New Mexico Mutant Baby Massacre
